name: Return of Dr. Destructo
description: Dr. Destructo is at it again like it's 1987! The madman with his own army and fleet threatens the Earth with unspecified evil plans! Only YOU can stop him (and forest fires). Take control of the best fighter plane on the planet and try to shoot down and sink everything Dr. Destructo throws your way in this remake of "Island of Dr. Destructo", a classic ZX Spectrum game from 80's. 21 levels and 15 types of enemies await you.
